info.title: Django API
info.description: AI-powered tool that helps institutions automatically generate, review, and manage Assessments while ensuring alignment with curriculum materials.

get.description: Simple health check to verify the API is running

value.detail: You do not have permission to perform this action.

get.description: Get CSRF token for frontend applications that need session-based authentication

value.detail: You do not have permission to perform this action.

get.description: Check the status of an asynchronous Celery task by its task ID

parameters.name: task_id
parameters.description: The UUID of the Celery task to check

result.description: Task result (only present when status is SUCCESS)

error.description: Error message (only present when status is FAILURE)

traceback.description: Error traceback (only present when status is FAILURE)

date_done.description: When the task completed (only present when task is done)

value.detail: You do not have permission to perform this action.

get.description:
Get basic dashboard statistics for the application.

    This is a template endpoint that can be customized based on your application's needs.
    Currently returns basic system statistics that can be extended.

total_log_entries.description: Total number of audit log entries

recent_log_entries.description: Number of log entries in last 24 hours

value.detail: You do not have permission to perform this action.

post.description: Login with email and password.
Logout user and blacklist JWT refresh token. Reads refresh token from httpOnly cookies automatically. No request body required.

schema.description: Refresh token was not found in cookies or is invalid.

get.description: Get current authenticated user's profile information.

put.description: Update current authenticated user's profile information.

patch.description: Partially update current authenticated user's profile information.

post.description: Change user's password. Requires current password for verification.
Send password reset email to user.
Confirm password reset with token and set new password. This endpoint validates the reset token and sets a new password for the user.

parameters.name: token
parameters.description: Password reset token

parameters.name: uid
parameters.description: User ID (base36 encoded)

post.description: Refresh JWT access token using refresh token from httpOnly cookies. No request body required.
Register a new user account. Creates user profile and assigns appropriate role.
Verify user's email address with verification token.
Resend email verification token to user.
Initialize two-factor authentication setup for the current user.
Verify the 2FA setup with a token to confirm the device.
Verify a 2FA token during login process.
Disable two-factor authentication for the current user.
Generate new backup codes for 2FA recovery.

get.description: Get the current two-factor authentication status for the user.
Returns a paginated list of history items (audit log entries) for all models in the system. Only staff/admins can view.

CustomLoginRequest.description: Custom login serializer that uses email instead of username.

CustomTokenRefresh.description:
Custom token refresh serializer that reads refresh token from cookies
instead of request body, since frontend cannot access httpOnly cookies.
